graphDescriptions.title: Fully trusted
graphDescriptions.description: Emails delivered with both successful SPF and DKIM.

graphDescriptions.title: Partially trusted
graphDescriptions.description: Emails delivered with either successful SPF or DKIM.

graphDescriptions.title: Untrusted
graphDescriptions.description: Emails delivered where SPF and DKIM both failed.

graphDescriptions.title: Quarantined
graphDescriptions.description: Emails sent to spam folder because both SPF and DKIM failed.

graphDescriptions.title: Rejected
graphDescriptions.description: Emails not delivered to the user because both SPF and DKIM failed.
